alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 11:31AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Robeson County through 1215 PM EDT... At 1131 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buie, or near Red Springs, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Red Springs, Pembroke, Maxton, St. Pauls, Buie, Wakulla, Rex, Prospect, Shannon, Parkton and Rennert. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 24 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
